https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/84e5q4ViiAX1ynW10NSrPLx2nhr.jpg Stockholm, Sweden. A warm summer night is torn apart by flashing lights and loud music. Trembling air full of hopes and expectations. Four people end up at the same place for the same reason, because the night. Because the Night
